name: Block Spam Comments
author: Al Hizbul Bahar

sections.description: Main feature and goal of this plugin ‘Block Spam Comments’ is to detect spam comments and create a shield to protect from submit this unwanted robot comments without using captcha. Plugin size is less than 1 KB, so no tension about storage size. Install and Activate then enjoy spam free website.
sections.installation:
Installation is very easy like other wordpress plugin
e.g.

  1. Upload Block Spam Comments to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

How do I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.

Any further process to use ?

Nothing else after activating, lets enjoy.
